test-case.name: K-FloorFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `floor()`.

test-case.name: K-FloorFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `floor(1, 2)`.

test-case.name: K-FloorFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(floor(()))`.

test-case.name: K-FloorFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `floor(10.5) eq 10`.

test-case.name: K-FloorFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `floor(-10.5) eq -11`.

test-case.name: K-FloorFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `floor("a string")`.

test-case.name: fn-floor-1
test-case.description: check dynamic type of fn:floor on argument of union of numeric types.
test-case.test: for $x in (1, xs:decimal(2), xs:float(3), xs:double(4)) return if ((floor($x)) instance of xs:integer) then "integer" else if ((floor($x)) instance of xs:decimal) then "decimal" else if ((floor($x)) instance of xs:float) then "float" else if ((floor($x)) instance of xs:double) then "double" else error()
